Text:
thanks for posting this...
However, it's season 3 begins with Utopia or Deuteranopia, not season 1 (see [url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_%C3%86on_Flux_episodes[/url]).

also, technically, MPEG2 is considered a form of compression...whereas VOB is actually lossless.

@metal chef

I used the dvd order on tvdb for the episode listing so it would show up in XBMC that's why they all say S01.

http://thetvdb.com/index.php?tab=seasonall&id=78660&lid=7&order=dvd

As for the mp2's, all I did was rip the vobs without file splitting and stream copy it into mpg. I did no further encoding and they should be identical to the source.
SEED PLEASEEEEEEE !!!! (and thanks by the way)
SEED, SEED, SEED Please. Would really like to see this. Much appreciated. Cheers.
